summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3301, for the improvement of the alley in block 23, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Harvard Avenue North and Boylston Avenue North, from Hamlin Street to Shelby Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40896 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
